dd.p: You can determine every aspect of the behavior of the connector by writing code in a Java file. However, some aspects can be set separately by setting parameters in a configuration file. This option tells you what can be set by configuration.
You can define the connection by setting parameters in the scortconnectors.propertiesconfiguration file.
For a complete list of the values you can set in this file see:

ul.li: the MIS Connector Framework Configuration Guide, and
